text.p: Cleanup continues along the Red River in the upper Plains of the USA and in southern Manitoba, Canada, near Winnepeg.

Tropical cyclone 01b continues to weaken as it moves rapidly inland. It has moved to the north of Bangladesh in the most recent reports and top winds are now less than 50 mph. Floods caused by heavy rain will continue to build in the region for a couple of more days before diminishing. In addition it will likely be several days before the full extent of the damage in the area of landfall will be fully assessed. We expect that damage will be quite high as this was a strong cyclone when it made landfall.
